rpmTag.name: Description
rpmTag.string: This package include managemt tools, like qvm-*.

rpmTag.name: Changelogtext
rpmTag.string: - Document that qvm-service are stored as qvm-features
- Copy a dictionary on use in mock API
- qvm-start-daemon: fix remaining process on new audiovm
- qvm-start-daemon: one more pass on isolating services
- qvm-start-daemon: fix missing short alias for debug
- qvm-start-daemon: set enabled services for launcher
- qvm-start-daemon: improve dynamic switch for audiovm
- qvm-start-daemon: improve logging and update sphinx
- qvm-start-daemon: ignore self qube for starting audio/gui daemons
- qvm-create.rst: update from dispvm_allowed to template_for_dispvms
- Enable starting DispVMs from admin API
- seperate with comma to avoid column ambiguity
- printing list object as one string for list-like properties
- improving test coverage, removing unused imports
- redirect rpmbuild output to dev-null making the test lest verbose in the logs
- add tests for the new rpm extraction logic
- raise exception if symlink not found + add a note about file order in tar
- issue #8876: first seemingly working draft, tests not updated/extended yet, unclear if part order can be assumed [skip ci]
- minor cleanup of rpm2cpio usage leftover in var name
- Revert "Do not enable "low latency" mode for pipewire"
- Switch to sequoia for codecov signature check
- Add attaching devices to mock API
- Add a mock Qubes object with improved contents

rpmTag.name: Spec
rpmTag.string:
Name: qubes-core-admin-client Version: 4.2.14 Release: 1.fc41 Summary: Qubes OS admin client tools
Group: Qubes License: LGPLv2.1+ URL: https://www.qubes-os.org
BuildRequires: make BuildRequires: python3-setuptools BuildRequires: python3-devel BuildRequires: python3-sphinx BuildRequires: python3-dbus BuildRequires: python3-lxml BuildRequires: python3-xcffib BuildRequires: python3-tqdm BuildRequires: python3-yaml BuildRequires: python3-pyxdg BuildRequires: python3-rpm Requires: python3-qubesadmin Requires: python3-yaml Requires: qubes-repo-templates Requires: scrypt Requires: qubes-rpm-oxide >= 0.2.3 Requires: xrandr BuildArch: noarch Source0: qubes-core-admin-client-4.2.14.tar.gz Conflicts: qubes-core-agent < 4.1.9
Conflicts: qubes-gui-daemon < 4.1.7
%description This package include managemt tools, like qvm-*.
%package -n python3-qubesadmin Summary: Python3 module qubesadmin Requires: python3-docutils Requires: python3-lxml Requires: python3-xcffib Requires: python3-qubesdb Requires: python3-rpm Requires: python3-tqdm Requires: python3-pyxdg Conflicts: qubes-core-dom0 < 4.1.12 Conflicts: qubes-manager < 4.0.6
%description -n python3-qubesadmin Python3 module qubesadmin.
%prep cd '/builddir/build/BUILD/qubes-core-admin-client-4.2.14-build' rm -rf 'qubes-core-admin-client-4.2.14' /usr/lib/rpm/rpmuncompress -x '/builddir/build/SOURCES/qubes-core-admin-client-4.2.14.tar.gz' STATUS=$? if [ $STATUS -ne 0 ]; then exit $STATUS fi cd 'qubes-core-admin-client-4.2.14' /usr/bin/chmod -Rf a+rX,u+w,g-w,o-w .
%build make -C doc PYTHON=/usr/bin/python3 SPHINXBUILD=sphinx-build-%{python3_version} man
%install rm -rf build /usr/bin/make install DESTDIR=/builddir/build/BUILD/qubes-core-admin-client-4.2.14-build/BUILDROOT INSTALL="/usr/bin/install -p" PYTHON=/usr/bin/python3
make -C doc DESTDIR=$RPM_BUILD_ROOT \ PYTHON=/usr/bin/python3 SPHINXBUILD=sphinx-build-%{python3_version} \ install
%files %defattr(-,root,root,-) %doc LICENSE %config /etc/xdg/autostart/qvm-start-daemon.desktop %config /etc/xdg/autostart/qvm-start-daemon-kde.desktop /usr/bin/qubes-* /usr/bin/qvm-* /usr/share/man/man1/qvm-*.1* /usr/share/man/man1/qubes*.1*
%files -n python3-qubesadmin %{python3_sitelib}/qubesadmin-*egg-info %{python3_sitelib}/qubesadmin /etc/qubes/post-install.d/30-keyboard-layout-service.sh
%changelog * Sat May 25 2024 Qubes OS Team <qubes-devel@googlegroups.com> - For complete changelog see: https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-core-admin-client.git
* Sat May 25 2024 Marek Marczykowski-Górecki <marmarek@invisiblethingslab.com> - 0572987 - version 4.2.14
* Sun May 19 2024 Marek Marczykowski-Górecki <marmarek@invisiblethingslab.com> - 7f8da8a - Fix creating template.rpm symlink
* Fri May 17 2024 Marek Marczykowski-Górecki <marmarek@invisiblethingslab.com> - 509a50c - rpm: drop unused python3-daemon dependency
* Wed May 15 2024 Marek Marczykowski-Górecki <marmarek@invisiblethingslab.com> - a0c61ee - version 4.2.13
* Wed May 15 2024 Marek Marczykowski-Górecki <marmarek@invisiblethingslab.com> - 5486fb8 - Make pylint happy
* Tue May 14 2024 Marek Marczykowski-Górecki <marmarek@invisiblethingslab.com> - 62b5623 - Document that qvm-service are stored as qvm-features
* Sat May 11 2024 Marek Marczykowski-Górecki <marmarek@invisiblethingslab.com> - ba9cbf6 - Get local name from qubesdb
* Fri May 10 2024 Frédéric Pierret (fepitre) <frederic.pierret@qubes-os.org> - 626f183 - qvm_start_daemon: improve reset property handling
* Mon May 06 2024 Marta Marczykowska-Górecka <marmarta@invisiblethingslab.com> - 9e8d0c5 - Remove deprecated pkg_resources library
* Fri May 03 2024 Frédéric Pierret (fepitre) <frederic.pierret@qubes-os.org> - a1b6764 - qvm-start-daemon: fix TypeError in message
* Thu May 02 2024 Marek Marczykowski-Górecki <marmarek@invisiblethingslab.com> - 86d0312 - qvm-start-daemon: handle policy denials
* Mon Apr 29 2024 Marta Marczykowska-Górecka <marmarta@invisiblethingslab.com> - e56ecc6 - Copy a dictionary on use in mock API
* Mon Apr 29 2024 Marek Marczykowski-Górecki <marmarek@invisiblethingslab.com> - 0998895 - version 4.2.12
* Fri Apr 26 2024 Frédéric Pierret (fepitre) <frederic.pierret@qubes-os.org> - 118dc83 - qvm-start-daemon: fix remaining process on new audiovm
* Tue Apr 23 2024 Frédéric Pierret (fepitre) <frederic.pierret@qubes-os.org> - afc583d - qvm-start-daemon: remove manual call on_connection_established
